title: Listen to an Exclusive Forever35 Excerpt of Thanks for Waiting
itunes:title: Listen to an Exclusive Forever35 Excerpt of Thanks for Waiting
itunes:subtitle: In this exclusive excerpt from THANKS FOR WAITING, Doree tells the story of her one-night-stand with a Breathalyzer salesman, and also how it felt to go to her much younger sister's wedding as a single person. Download THANKS FOR WAITING at libro....
description:
In this exclusive excerpt from THANKS FOR WAITING, Doree tells the story of her one-night-stand with a Breathalyzer salesman, and also how it felt to go to her much younger sister's wedding as a single person. Download THANKS FOR WAITING at libro.fm, Audible or wherever you get your audiobooks.


Audio excerpted from THANKS FOR WAITING: The Joy (& Weirdness) of Being a Late Bloomer by Doree Shafrir, read by the author. Copyright 2021 by Doree Shafrir. Production Copyright 2021, Penguin Random House, LLC. All rights reserved.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
